record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 2991
record.narrative:
MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 2991 -- (Senate - May 08, 2008)

[Page: S3935]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that S. 2991 is at the desk and due for a second reading.

record.narrative: The clerk will read the bill by title for the second time.
The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 2991) to provide energy relief, hold oil companies and other entities accountable for their actions with regard to high energy prices, and for other purposes.

speaking.paragraph: I object to any further proceedings with respect to the bill.

record.chair: Objection having been heard, the bill will be placed on the calendar.
